_header: Ye have so long kept o / The sheep up on the grene Wilkyn
_description: ‘Sayth ȝe love me best’, a song with music — sixteen lines

BodDou381.First Lines:
Ȝe have so longe kepyt o [Þe] schepe [up] on the grene
                    Wilkyn…
BodDou381.Last Lines: …Thys may ryme wel but hit a lo acordis nouȝt
BodDou381.Note:
Reading following Dobson  and  Harrison (1979)
